in_ports.description: Seed value. Sequences are repeatable by using the same seed.
in_ports.name: SEED

in_ports.description: Receives a pulse to generate a new random boolean.
in_ports.name: IN

members.description: Seed value. Sequences are repeatable by using the same seed.
members.name: seed

out_ports.description: Random boolean. Do NOT use it for anything else than test purposes.
out_ports.name: OUT
